name: Escape or DIE (Dani Prokisch)
description:
Control a DIE on the board and help the burglar escape from the police.

Nudge the dice FORWARD or BACK and TURN with the ARROW keys.

Throw the dice with SPACE to move the figures on the board.

Hit the brick walls to break them.

Land on the last tile to win.

This game was made for the 2022 GMTK Game Jam for the theme of "Roll of the Dice".
